name: Appian Cloud
short_description: Appian delivers an enterprise application platform that unites users with all their data, processes, and collaborations – in one environment, on any mobile device, through a simple social interface.
long_description: As the market leader in modern Business Process Management (BPM) and Case Management software, Appian delivers an enterprise application platform that unites users with all their data, processes, and collaborations – in one environment, on any mobile device, through a simple social interface. With Appian Cloud, Federal Agencies can rapidly build, deploy, use, and scale innovative apps. Appian Cloud’s easy integration with on-premise systems allows Agencies to build cohesive solutions that increase efficiency, accelerate mission attainment and improve service delivery.
